quote: Truth is one; the wise call it by different names.
author: Rigveda

quote: Let noble thoughts come to us from every side.
author: Rigveda

quote: The mind is endless, a field of knowledge, moving faster than the wind.
author: Yajurveda

quote: He who bestows all desires fulfills them too.
author: Atharvaveda

quote: May all beings look at us with the eye of a friend.
author: Yajurveda

quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
author: Buddha

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
author: Buddha

quote: Do not dwell in the past; do not dream of the future; concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
author: Buddha

quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
author: Buddha

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: Buddha

quote: Work out your salvation with diligence.
author: Buddha

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: If you light a lamp for someone else, it will also brighten your path.
author: Buddha

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
author: Buddha

quote: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: In a controversy, the instant we feel anger, we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves.
author: Buddha

quote: Have compassion for all beings, rich and poor alike; each has their suffering. Some suffer too much, others too little.
author: Buddha

quote: The root of all suffering is ignorance, not the actions of others.
author: Buddha

quote: Speak or act with a pure mind, and happiness will follow you as your shadow, unshakable.
author: Buddha

quote: Kindness should become the natural way of life, not the exception.
author: Buddha

quote: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world.
author: Buddha

quote: sach ek hi hai; gyani ise alag-alag naam se bulate hain
author: Rigveda

quote: har tarah se hamare paas utkrisht vichar aayein
author: Rigveda

quote: mann anant hai, gyaan ka kshetra, hawa se bhi tez chalne wala
author: Yajurveda

quote: jo sabhi icchayein pradan karta hai, unhe bhi poora karta hai
author: Atharvaveda

quote: sabhi prani hamare upar mitr drishti se dekhein
author: Yajurveda

quote: teen cheezein jyada der tak chhipi nahi reh sakti: suraj, chaand aur sach
author: Buddha

quote: mann sab kuch hai. jo aap sochte hain, wahi ban jaate hain
author: Buddha

quote: khushi ki koi raah nahi hai: khushi hi raah hai
author: Buddha

quote: beete hue samay mein mat jeevo; aane wale kal ka sapna mat dekho; apne mann ko vartamaan pal par kendrit karo
author: Buddha

quote: shanti aapke andar se aati hai. ise bahar mat dhoondho
author: Buddha

quote: jaise bina aag ke mombatti nahi jal sakti, waise bina aadhyatmik jeevan ke insaan nahi ji sakte
author: Buddha

quote: ek vichar jo viksit hota hai aur kriya mein laaya jaata hai, wah ek vichar jo sirf vichar hi rehta hai, usse jyada mahatvapurn hai
author: Buddha

quote: jeevan mein asli haar wahi hai jab hum apni acchai se sach nahi rahte
author: Buddha

quote: mehnat se apne udhaar par kaam karo
author: Buddha

quote: har subah hum dobara janm lete hain. aaj jo karte hain wahi sabse mahatvapurn hai
author: Buddha

quote: agar aap kisi aur ke liye deepak jalate ho, toh yeh aapka raasta bhi roshan karega
author: Buddha

quote: nafrat se nafrat khatam nahi hoti, sirf prem se hi yeh nibti hai; yeh ek anant niyam hai
author: Buddha

quote: hazaron mombatti ek mombatti se jalai ja sakti hain, aur mombatti ki umar bhi kam nahi hoti. khushi bantne se kabhi kam nahi hoti
author: Buddha

quote: ek vivad mein, jaise hi hum gussa mehsoos karte hain, hum sach ke liye pratishthit hone se ruk jaate hain, aur khud ke liye pratishthit hona shuru kar dete hain
author: Buddha

quote: sabhi praniyon ke liye daya rakho, amir aur garib dono ke liye; har ek ka apna dard hota hai. kuch log bahut jyada dard mehsoos karte hain, kuch bahut kam
author: Buddha

quote: sara dukh agyaan ka mool hai, doosron ke aachran nahi
author: Buddha

quote: shuddh mann se baat karo ya kuch karo, aur khushi aapka peechha karegi jaise aapki chhaya, atoot
author: Buddha

quote: daya ek prakritik jeewan vyavahar hona chahiye, koi apavadhan nahi
author: Buddha

quote: duniya pe prati aparichit pyar faliaey
author: Buddha
